sentence.Network_en: I name the male Arthur after the legendary monarch who loved falconry.
sentence.Network_cn: 我给雄性游隼起名为亚瑟,是以传说中喜欢训练猎鹰的那位君主的名字命名的.

sentence.Network_en: A female of this species, used in falconry.
Females of the genus Falco are larger and Bolder than males and are preferred for falconry.
sentence.Network_cn: 真隼的雌鸟个体较大,较凶猛,故鹰猎者喜用雌隼.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French fauconnerie, from faucon (see falcon)

entry.def: Falconry is the skill of training falcons to hunt, and the sport of using them to hunt.

means.word_mean: 1. the art of training falcons to hunt and return
